intro: Stomoisia, commonly known as the "Saddleback" plant, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its woody stems and palmate leaves, which often have a distinctive shape. The flowers are typically clustered in inflorescences and are usually pink or white in color. Stomoisia species are native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa and Asia. They are often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
